justification: Standard rare disease prevalence (1-9 / 100 000) within EU definition; Monogenic disease caused by gene PMM2, ideal for gene therapy approaches; No approved therapies available, representing high unmet medical need; Active clinical research in Spain with 2 ongoing trial(s): NCT05549219 (24-Week Study to Assess the PD, Safety, Tolerability, and PK of GLM101 in Participants With PMM2-CDG); NCT03173300 (Natural History Study Protocol in PMM2-CDG (CDG-Ia)); Socioeconomic impact: assumed high (mock phase); Research groups: assumed active involvement (mock phase)
